value.title: Machine Learning: Artificial Neural Networks Localize Extrasystoles
value.excerpt: Up to a certain number, ventricular extrasystoles are normal. Ventricular tachycardias, however, may impair cardiac action and even be life-threatening in case of existing cardiac insufficiency. Ventricular tachycardias may be treated by catheter ablation: The origin of the extrasystoles is ablated by high-frequency current via a special catheter.
